mutations.name: Enhanced Attack-Defense Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a moderate synergy between Attack and Defense groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Attack and Defense groups are present, both receive a moderate attribute bonus
mutations.effectDescription: When Attack and Defense groups are present, both receive a 7% attribute bonus

mutations.name: Enhanced Control-Movement Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a moderate synergy between Control and Movement groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Control and Movement groups are present, both receive a moderate attribute bonus
mutations.effectDescription: When Control and Movement groups are present, both receive a 7% attribute bonus

mutations.name: Enhanced Core Resonance
mutations.description: Creates a moderate synergy between Core and any other group
mutations.synergyEffect: Core group provides a moderate attribute bonus to all other groups
mutations.effectDescription: Core group provides a 5% attribute bonus to all other groups

mutations.name: Attack-Control Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a moderate synergy between Attack and Control groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Attack and Control groups are present, Attack gains range and Control gains damage
mutations.effectDescription: When Attack and Control groups are present, Attack gains 7% ability range and Control gains 7% ability damage

mutations.name: Defense-Movement Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a moderate synergy between Defense and Movement groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Defense and Movement groups are present, Defense gains duration and Movement gains cooldown reduction
mutations.effectDescription: When Defense and Movement groups are present, Defense gains 7% ability duration and Movement gains 7% cooldown reduction
